compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\barik\\Downloads\\Serverless-.serviceRawFile:
org: soumya1998
app: serverless-app-main
service: final-daily-schdule-mail

stages:
  default:
    params:
      tableName: "users-table-${sls:stage}"

plugins:
  - serverless-wsgi
  - serverless-python-requirements

custom:
  tableName: "users-table-${sls:stage}"
  wsgi:
    app: app.app
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: true
    slim: true
    zip: true
    layer: true

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.12
  region: ap-south-1
  stage: dev
  httpApi:
    cors:
      allowedOrigins:
        - "http://localhost:3000"
      allowedHeaders:
        - Content-Type
      allowedMethods:
        - GET
        - POST
        - OPTIONS
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action: SNS:Publish
          Resource: !Ref QuotesMessages
        - Effect: Allow
          Action: "s3:*"
          Resource: "*"
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
          Resource:
            - Fn::GetAtt: [ UsersTable, Arn ]
  environment:
    USERS_TABLE: ${param:tableName}
    REGION: ${self:provider.region}
    SNS_TOPIC_ARN: arn:aws:sns:ap-south-1:952389988652:quotes-messages-dev

functions:
  api:
    handler: wsgi_handler.handler
    layers:
      - { Ref: FlaskLayerLambdaLayer }    # needs Flask
      - { Ref: CommonLayerLambdaLayer }   # also needs common
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY

  staticMailer:
    handler: static_mailer.static_mailer
    layers:
      - { Ref: CommonLayerLambdaLayer }   # only needs common
    events:
      - http:
          path: mailer
          method: post
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
  #SNS
    QuotesMessages:
      Type: AWS::SNS::Topic
      Properties:
        TopicName: quotes-messages-${self:provider.stage}
    QuotesMessagesSubscription:
      Type: AWS::SNS::Subscription
      Properties:
        TopicArn: !Ref QuotesMessages
        Protocol: email
        Endpoint: bariksoumyadipwork@gmail.com
        DeliveryPolicy: 
          healthyRetryPolicy:
            numRetries: 20
            minDelayTarget: 30
            maxDelayTarget: 600
            backoffFunction: exponential



    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        TableName: ${self:custom.tableName}

layers:
  CommonLayer:
    path: layer/python/common
    name: common-layer
    description: "Common utilities (requests, etc.)"
    compatibleRuntimes:
      - python3.12

  FlaskLayer:
    path: layer/python/flask
    name: flask-layer
    description: "Flask + Werkzeug + awsgi"
    compatibleRuntimes:
      - python3.12

package:
  exclude:
    - front-end/**
    - .vscode/**
    - .serverless/**
    - .venv/**
    - __pycache__/**
    - node_modules/**
    - .git/**
    - .next/**
    - tests/**
    - README.md
    - package-lock.json
    - quotes.json
